channel.title: Wtf?
channel.description:
ok, i just opened my photoshop because i wanted to make a avatar for a site i just signed up to, i do a bg blk and white, then i try to colourise it, but it doesnt work, it is still black and white. Then i try to do some text in a diffenernt colour, doesnt work, then i try to select a red colour but it just turns grey. Then i try add a blue c4d, i copy it in, and it turns grey...
WTF????
please could somebody help me fix it :S

item.title: Wtf?
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

[quote=“alexia, post:3, topic:35485”]Could be in the grayscale mode on photoshop? To change it (although I don’t remember exactly) it is something like Image > Mode > RGB Color

-Alexia[/quote]

Thank you so much !!!

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf?
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

Could be in the grayscale mode on photoshop? To change it (although I don’t remember exactly) it is something like Image > Mode > RGB Color

-Alexia

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf?
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

  1. Restart computer
  2. Add a new layer.

Read full topic
